title: When replacing C9560 does not work.
message: Had a couple of bords come back after replacing C9560. Replaced with larger non tant caps 2v 330uF but still getting shutdowns.... They are from donor boards though.

title: When replacing C9560 does not work.
message: Yeah hopeless garbage. Replace the GPU and also the VRAM if it is Samsung, but expect returns regardless.

title: When replacing C9560 does not work.
message: Not a chance. Think I'll just refuse them.

title: When replacing C9560 does not work.
message: Still most of them will be fine with C9560, so I just refund the ones that come back.
